add_link.search_note: search for note by its name
add_link.link_title_mirrors: link title mirrors the note's current title
add_link.link_title_arbitrary: link title can be changed arbitrarily

bulk_actions.include_descendants: Include descendants of the selected notes
bulk_actions.bulk_actions_executed: Bulk actions have been executed successfully.
bulk_actions.none_yet: None yet ... add an action by clicking one of the available ones above.

clone_to.search_for_note_by_its_name: search for note by its name
clone_to.cloned_note_prefix_title: Cloned note will be shown in note tree with given prefix

confirm.are_you_sure_remove_note: Are you sure you want to remove the note "{{title}}" from relation map?
confirm.if_you_dont_check: If you don't check this, the note will be only removed from the relation map.

delete_notes.delete_all_clones_description: delete also all clones (can be undone in recent changes)
delete_notes.erase_notes_description: Normal (soft) deletion only marks the notes as deleted and they can be undeleted (in recent changes dialog) within a period of time. Checking this option will erase the notes immediately and it won't be possible to undelete the notes.
delete_notes.erase_notes_warning: erase notes permanently (can't be undone), including all clones. This will force application reload.
delete_notes.notes_to_be_deleted: Following notes will be deleted ()
delete_notes.no_note_to_delete: No note will be deleted (only clones).
delete_notes.broken_relations_to_be_deleted: Following relations will be broken and deleted ()
delete_notes.to_be_deleted: (to be deleted) is referenced by relation {{attrName}} originating from

export.export_type_subtree: this note and all of its descendants
export.format_html: HTML in ZIP archive - this is recommended since this preserves all the formatting.
export.format_markdown: Markdown - this preserves most of the formatting.
export.format_opml: OPML - outliner interchange format for text only. Formatting, images and files are not included.
export.export_type_single: only this note without its descendants

help.goUpDown: go up/down in the list of notes
help.goBackForwards: go back / forwards in the history
help.newTabNoteLink: (or middle mouse click) on note link opens note in a new tab
help.createNoteAfter: create new note after the active note
help.createNoteInto: create new sub-note into active note
help.editBranchPrefix: edit prefix of active note clone
help.moveNoteUpDown: move note up/down in the note list
help.moveNoteUpHierarchy: move note up in the hierarchy
help.selectAllNotes: select all notes in the current level
help.copyNotes: copy active note (or current selection) into clipboard (used for cloning)
help.cutNotes: cut current (or current selection) note into clipboard (used for moving notes)
help.pasteNotes: paste note(s) as sub-note into active note (which is either move or clone depending on whether it was copied or cut into clipboard)
help.editNoteTitle: in tree pane will switch from tree pane into note title. Enter from note title will switch focus to text editor. will switch back from editor to tree pane.
help.insertDateTime: insert current date and time at caret position
help.jumpToTreePane: jump away to the tree pane and scroll to active note
help.headings: etc. followed by space for headings
help.bulletList: <kbd>*</kbd> or <kbd>-</kbd> followed by space for bullet list
help.numberedList: <kbd>1.</kbd> or <kbd>1)</kbd> followed by space for numbered list
help.blockQuote: start a line with <kbd>></kbd> followed by space for block quote

import.importDescription: Content of the selected file(s) will be imported as child note(s) into
import.safeImportTooltip: Trilium .zip export files can contain executable scripts which may contain harmful behavior. Safe import will deactivate automatic execution of all imported scripts. Uncheck "Safe import" only if the imported archive is supposed to contain executable scripts and you completely trust the contents of the import file.
import.explodeArchivesTooltip: If this is checked then Trilium will read .zip, .enex and .opml files and create notes from files insides those archives. If unchecked, then Trilium will attach the archives themselves to the note.
import.shrinkImagesTooltip:
If you check this option, Trilium will attempt to shrink the imported images by scaling and optimization which may affect the perceived image quality. If unchecked, images will be imported without changes.

This doesn't apply to .zip imports with metadata since it is assumed these files are already optimized.
import.textImportedAsText: Import HTML, Markdown and TXT as text notes if it's unclear from metadata
import.codeImportedAsCode: Import recognized code files (e.g. .json) as code notes if it's unclear from metadata
import.replaceUnderscoresWithSpaces: Replace underscores with spaces in imported note names

include_note.placeholder_search: search for note by its name
include_note.box_size_prompt: Box size of the included note:

jump_to_note.search_placeholder: search for note by its name

markdown_import.modal_body_text: Because of browser sandbox it's not possible to directly read clipboard from JavaScript. Please paste the Markdown to import to textarea below and click on Import button
markdown_import.import_success: Markdown content has been imported into the document.

move_to.search_placeholder: search for note by its name
move_to.move_success_message: Selected notes have been moved into

note_type_chooser.modal_body: Choose note type / template of the new note:

password_not_set.title: Password is not set
password_not_set.body1: Protected notes are encrypted using a user password, but password has not been set yet.
password_not_set.body2: To be able to protect notes, click here to open the Options dialog and set your password.

protected_session_password.form_label: To proceed with requested action you need to start protected session by entering password:

recent_changes.title: Recent changes
recent_changes.confirm_undelete: Do you want to undelete this note and its sub-notes?

revisions.delete_all_revisions: Delete all revisions of this note
revisions.revision_last_edited: This revision was last edited on {{date}}
revisions.confirm_delete_all: Do you want to delete all revisions of this note? This action will erase revision title and content, but still preserve revision metadata.
revisions.no_revisions: No revisions for this note yet...
revisions.confirm_restore: Do you want to restore this revision? This will overwrite current title and content of the note with this revision.
revisions.confirm_delete: Do you want to delete this revision? This action will delete revision title and content, but still preserve revision metadata.
revisions.preview_not_available: Preview isn't available for this note type.

sort_child_notes.title: title
sort_child_notes.sort_with_respect_to_different_character: sort with respect to different character sorting and collation rules in different languages or regions.
sort_child_notes.the_language_code_for_natural_sort: The language code for natural sort, e.g. "zh-CN" for Chinese.

upload_attachments.files_will_be_uploaded: Files will be uploaded as attachments into
upload_attachments.tooltip: If you check this option, Trilium will attempt to shrink the uploaded images by scaling and optimization which may affect the perceived image quality. If unchecked, images will be uploaded without changes.
